LanguageData.HediffAdrenalineMedium.label: medium adrenaline boost
LanguageData.HediffAdrenalineMedium.description: The colony is under attack, let's defend our lives! All to the combat posts!
LanguageData.HediffAdrenalineSmall.label: small adrenaline boost
LanguageData.HediffAdrenalineSmall.description: I heard the alarm. Let's see what happens.
